author: perezhilton
title: Lets Lively SHINE On The Golden Globes Red Carpet! | CocoPerez.com
text:
What a beautiful couple!!
It almost feels like forever since we've seen Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively on the red carpet together, but on Sunday night, they more than made up for missed time!
While the Golden Globes -nominated poppa looked dapper in his well-fitted black tux, there's no denying his beautiful wife was the standout!
Blake continued to show off her killer post-baby body in a black Atelier Versace gown with draped, gold accents. A jaw-dropping emerald bracelet and perfectly done makeup completed a dazzling look!
How do U think these A-listers did??
[ Image via Getty Images .]
Tags: blake lively , fashion smashion , golden globes , golden globes 2017 , red carpet , ryan reynolds , versace
